title: Zoomdata Introduces the Industry's First Cloud-Native Analytics Layer That Unifies Data in the Cloud and On-Premise
text:
New cloud partner enablement program launched. 
The typical enterprise today is dealing with a combination of big data, relational data, real-time and historical data -- that is deployed both on-prem, and across a combination of public and private clouds (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform, etc.). Analytics using multiple data sources and structures has become the norm, and businesses are challenged to tap into their data assets without incurring significant engineering and infrastructure costs. Zoomdata 2.0 is the first business intelligence solution that enables hybrid cloud on-prem deployments, delivering maximum flexibility. 
To support this new "Analytics Anywhere" requirement, Zoomdata has addressed the difficult challenge of delivering analytics as services that can literally be deployed anywhere: Enabling Cloud Deployments -- Through a series of joint development initiatives, Zoomdata has expanded the number of ways that Zoomdata can be deployed to major cloud offerings. Joining Zoomdata's public cloud partnerships on ClouderaLive on AWS , in the Databricks Cloud , and with Cisco to deliver Zoomdata on an Apache Mesos-based containerized architecture for Cisco Intercloud, today Zoomdata is announcing availability on Microsoft Azure which includes support for, HDInsights and Cloudera. Bringing Speed to Big Data Analytics -- Zoomdata has developed patented data-sharpening and micro-query technologies to address the speed requirements for modern analytics. Where the most popular desktop BI tools impose unacceptable load and processing times for large queries, Zoomdata gives users sub-second response time on queries of even billions of rows of data. As organizations increasingly move their big data workloads to the cloud, Zoomdata AnyCloud delivers this level of analytic performance across the broadest range of cloud platforms. Data Fusion -- With Zoomdata Fusion, businesses can virtually join and analyze data across an increasing variety of data stores. Zoomdata's patented smart connectors can combine and analyze data from multiple sources without moving or copying the data from the original sources. For example, users can leverage Fusion to virtually join transactional Big Data with customer or other dimensional data stored in a traditional relational database or data warehouse, to calculate metrics combining a new Big Data source with metrics from your existing enterprise data warehouse, or to correlate real-time data feeds with historical data across backend platforms. Learn more about Zoomdata Fusion . 
Partner Enablement Program Zoomdata recognizes the importance of building a partner ecosystem that can accelerate the deployment of customer solutions. With the Zoomdata Partner Enablement Program, resellers, integrators and trainers now have access to the tools to help them deploy programs for their customers. The Program features Partner Support Packages that include different options for sales and technical support, test and development licenses, joint marketing, training and webinars that highlight best practices for deploying Zoomdata. To learn more about the full scope of how Zoomdata is supporting Cloud, ISV and Reseller partners, visit: http://www.zoomdata.com/partners 
Key features and benefits of Zoomdata 2.0: 
Zoomdata Fusion Data virtualization for visual analytics across multiple data sources without moving data Enrich big data with master data from relational data sources, data warehouse dimension tables, or flat files Merge metrics from big data sources and traditional sources in the same visualization Business users combine multiple sources without having to wait for a data architect Achieve big data scale by pushing as much work as possible down into the big data source systems Leverage Apache Spark for cross-source operations 
New Smart Connectors for big data and Cloud Access big data in Apache HBase via Apache Phoenix Access big data in MemSQL Access cloud data in Salesforce, Google Analytics, Marketo, Zendesk and Sendgrid New programmable Enterprise Data Connector to create custom data connectors Combine on-prem and cloud data for fused insight 
To try Zoomdata 2.0 in the Cloud or download for on-prem visit http://www.zoomdata.com/download 
About Zoomdata, Inc. Zoomdata develops the world's fastest visual analytics solution for big data. Using patented data sharpening and micro-query technologies, Zoomdata empowers business users to visually consume data in seconds, even across billions of rows of data. Zoomdata Fusion enables interactive analytics across disparate data sources, bridging modern and legacy data architectures, blending real-time streams and historical data, and unifying enterprise data with data in the cloud. Delivered in a micro-services architecture for elastic scalability, Zoomdata runs on premises, in the cloud, hybrid cloud or embedded in an application. With offices in Washington, D.C. and Silicon Valley, Zoomdata is venture-backed by Accel Partners, Columbus Nova Technology Partners and NEA. Test drive Zoomdata today!
